snippet: New York’s cultural sector is still more diverse than arts institutions on the national level, according to a survey released by the city’s Cultural Affairs Department.
lead_paragraph: New York’s cultural sector is still more diverse than arts institutions on the national level, according to a survey released by the city’s Cultural Affairs Department.
abstract: Dept of Cultural Affairs survey finds arts organizations across New York City do not represent demographic diversity of area and announces efforts to improve situation.

headline.print_headline: New York Arts Groups Less Diverse Than City
headline.main: New York Arts Organizations Lack the Diversity of Their City
